mapper.sql: TABLE_ID, FIELD_NAME, F_IS_PK, F_IS_INDEX, INDEX_TYPE, LOCATION
mapper.insert:
insert into SM_TABLE_FIELD_TB
TABLE_ID,
FIELD_NAME,
F_IS_PK,
F_IS_INDEX,
INDEX_TYPE,
LOCATION,
#{tableId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fIsPk,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fIsIndex,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{indexType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{location,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update SM_TABLE_FIELD_TB
F_IS_PK = #{fIsPk,jdbcType=CHAR},
F_IS_INDEX = #{fIsIndex,jdbcType=CHAR},
INDEX_TYPE = #{indexType,jdbcType=CHAR},
LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and FIELD_NAME = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT B.FIELD_NAME,B.ELSE_NAME,B.FIELD_TYPE FROM SM_TABLE_FIELD_TB A, SM_FIELD_DEF_TB B WHERE A.FIELD_NAME=B.FIELD_NAME AND A.TABLE_ID=#{tableId} ORDER BY B.FIELD_NAME
